title: Healing Supplements and Products
description: Denise Bendl's healing products: Miessence and Hempworx, Mantra Essential Oils
cleaned_text: | | I have created a special supplement and healing products section to support everyone on their spiritual path. These products are ones that I personally recommend and can be helpful and effective depending on your particular situation. Each person's chemistry and healing needs are different at any given time, so please do your research and consult with your physician if you are under a medical physician's care. To view the different products, click on the links below and that will direct you to my healing products page. If you are interested in purchasing any products, you can do so from each of my product websites. Feel free to email me with any questions. I send you blessings of wellness and peace! 1. Certified Organic Skincare, Haircare, Cosmetics and Superfoods made in Australia: Miessence products are transforming and made with the highest quality ingredients. There are no chemicals whatsoever. 2. FDA Approved and Certified Organic CBD Oil: 3. Essential Oils : 4. Wellness sprays for Weight loss, Energy, Peak Performance, Brain Health and More: The Daily Sprays are simple and effective for daily use when losing weight, increasing energy and peak performance in daily life. Try the Keto formula, Sleep, Trim365 formula and others to improve your health and quality of life.
